original_text: Then Joshua made a treaty of peace with them to let them live, and the leaders of the assembly ratified it by oath.
korean_text: 여호수아가 곧 그들과 화친하여 그들을 살리리라는 조약을 맺고 회중 족장들이 그들에게 맹세하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then Joshua made a treaty of peace with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여호수아가 그들과 평화 조약을 맺었고

sentences.original_text: and the leaders of the assembly ratified it by oath.
